nodes.text: Shiin was a female slicer who owned a library in Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine, during the height of the New Order. Hidden within the databanks of the library were the B'omarr Registry and the Quilan Pyradex, just to name a few of the obscure and unusual documents Shiin had collected. Other information was regularly culled from corporate and governmental networks, and Shiin sometimes offered her services as slicer to her clientele.
